champinon-plancha-soriano.review: The mushrooms are perfectly cooked with an intense flavor and smooth texture.

champinon-plancha-blanco-negro.review: A more gourmet version with elegant presentation and refined flavors.

champinon-plancha-herrerias.review: Traditional and delicious, with the authentic flavor of Riojan cuisine.

foie-manzana-taberna.review: The contrast between foie and apple is perfect, an exquisite combination.

foie-manzana-rincon.review: A more modern version with creative presentation and balanced flavors.

pimientos-piquillo-soriano.review: The piquillo peppers are at their perfect point, with intense and spicy flavor.

pimientos-piquillo-blanco-negro.review: A more sophisticated version with elegant presentation and refined flavors.

pimientos-piquillo-herrerias.review: Traditional and delicious, with the authentic flavor of Riojan cuisine.

tortilla-patatas-soriano.review: The potato omelet is perfect, with ideal texture and traditional flavor.

tortilla-patatas-blanco-negro.review: A more gourmet version with quality ingredients and elegant presentation.

tortilla-patatas-herrerias.review: Traditional and delicious, with the authentic flavor of Riojan cuisine.
